original_text: All the pillars round about the court shall be filleted with silver; their hooks shall be of silver, and their sockets of brass.
korean_text: 뜰 주위 모든 기둥의 가름대와 갈고리는 은이요 그 받침은 놋이며

sentences.original_text: All the pillars round about the court shall be filleted with silver
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 주변의 모든 기둥은 은으로 필렛 처리되어야 한다

sentences.original_text: their hooks shall be of silver
